text: @GovernorVA That will be a HARD NO from me. You are a liar and a conman. Masks DO NOT prevent the spread of coronavirus. Mr. President (@realDonaldTrump), Virginia needs help from the Federal Government RIGHT NOW to protect our Constitutional rights against this tyranny! Please HELP us!
